Review_title: Powerful juxtaposed shots with excellent mixing of different media.
Review_Text: Being a product ofaColonial past is often difficult for one, as voids created by cultural appropriation and uprooting are seldom recorded. Those that find mentions, end up on the washed up shores of human consciousness, tarnished with biases, dependent on the brave few, who dare to record and revive, sometimes through oral history and other times, the written word. The perverse desire to civilise drawn through crayon
